Confidence interval of the reliability (accuracy index)

Source: R/main.R
boot_dcm.Rd

Confidence interval of the reliability (accuracy index)

boot_dcm(
  model,
  v_dep,
  v_ind = NULL,
  v_ind_composites = NULL,
  sample_size = 1000,
  replications = 1000
)

Arguments

model

Population relations among variables represented by Lavaan Syntax
v_dep

Vector of names of the dependent variables in your profile.
v_ind

Vector of names of independent variables you would like to control for.
v_ind_composites

Vector of names of independent variables that are composites of dependent variables
sample_size

The number of cases
replications

The number of trials

Value

simulated 95

Examples

m <- "
Gc =~ 0.85 * Gc_1 + 0.68 * Gc_2 + 0.80 * Gc_3
Gf =~ 0.80 * Gf_1 + 0.90 * Gf_2 + 0.80 * Gf_3
Gs =~ 0.70 * Gs_1 + 0.80 * Gs_2 + 0.80 * Gs_3
Read =~ 0.66 * Read_1 + 0.85 * Read_2 + 0.91 * Read_3
Math =~ 0.40 * Math_1 + 0.90 * Math_2 + 0.70 * Math3
Gc ~ 0.60 * Gf + 0.10 * Gs
Gf ~ 0.50 * Gs
Read ~ 0.40 * Gc + 0.10 * Gf
Math ~ 0.20 * Gc + 0.30 * Gf + 0.10 * Gs
"
boot_dcm(model = m,
         v_dep = c("Math", "Read"),
         v_ind = c("Gc", "Gf", "Gs"),
         sample_size = 100,
         replications = 100)

#>      2.5%       50%     97.5% 
#> 0.6999410 0.7911769 0.8509437
